David<WG1138> says,<WG3004> <WG1519> "Let<WG1096> their<WG846> table<WG5132> be made<WG1096> <WG1519> a snare,<WG3803> and<WG2532> <WG1519> a trap,<WG2339> <WG1519> <WG1519> a stumbling block,<WG4625> and<WG2532> <WG1519> a retribution<WG468> to them.<WG846>

if<WG1487> by any means<WG4459> I may provoke to jealousy<WG3863> those who are my<WG3450> flesh,<WG4561> and<WG2532> may save<WG4982> some<WG5100> of<WG1537> them.<WG846>

don't<WG3361> boast<WG2620> over the branches.<WG2798> But<WG1161> if<WG1487> you boast,<WG2620> it is not<WG3756> you<WG4571> who support<WG941> the root,<WG4491> but<WG235> the root<WG4491> supports you.<WG4571>

for<WG1063> if<WG1487> God<WG2316> didn't<WG3756> spare<WG5339> the<WG2798> natural<WG5449> branches,<WG2798> neither will he<WG5339> spare<WG5339> you.<WG4675>

<WG1161> They<WG1565> also,<WG2532> if<WG1437> they don't<WG3361> continue<WG1961> <WG1961> in their unbelief,<WG570> will be grafted in,<WG1461> for<WG1063> God<WG2316> is<WG2076> able<WG1415> to graft<WG1461> them<WG846> in<WG1461> again.<WG3825>

For<WG1063> if<WG1487> you<WG4771> were cut out<WG1581> of<WG1537> that which is by<WG2596> nature<WG5449> a wild<WG65> olive tree,<WG2532> and were grafted<WG1461> contrary to<WG3844> nature<WG5449> into<WG1519> a good olive tree,<WG2565> how much<WG4214> more<WG3123> will<WG1461> these,<WG3778> which are<WG3588> <WG2596> the natural<WG5449> branches,<WG1461> be grafted into their own<WG2398> olive tree?<WG1636>

and<WG2532> so<WG3779> all<WG3956> Israel<WG2474> will be saved.<WG4982> Even as<WG2531> it is written,<WG1125> "There will come<WG2240> out of<WG1537> Zion<WG4622> the Deliverer,<WG4506> and<WG2532> he will turn away<WG654> ungodliness<WG763> from<WG575> Jacob.<WG2384>
<WG2532> This<WG3778> is my<WG1700> covenant<WG1242> to them,<WG846> when<WG3752> I will take away<WG851> their<WG846> sins.<WG266>"

Concerning<WG2596> the Good News,<WG2098> they are enemies<WG2190> for<WG1223> your<WG5209> sake.<WG1223> But<WG1161> concerning<WG2596> the election,<WG1589> they are beloved<WG27> for<WG1223> the fathers<WG3962>' sake.<WG1223>
